title: Academy of Technology: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placement, Ranking
meta_description: Academy of Technology Admission 2024 is open for B.Tech and other degree courses based on JEE Main, WBJEE and other state level entrance exam scores. Check latest updates and news on Academy of TechnologyAdmission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placement, Ranking

basic_info.name: Academy of Technology, Hooghly Courses

basic_info.name: Academy of Technology, Hooghly Admission
description: Academy of Technology, Hooghly offers admission to students on the basis of scores obtained in entrance exams.

Admission to B.tech is based on JEE Mains/ WBJEE while, for lateral entry admission to B.tech course, one must have a JELET score. MBA and MCA Admission is done through MAT/ JEMAT and JECA respectively.
Candidates must apply for counselling for the desired course. The college does not conduct its own admissions.

basic_info.name: How To Apply?
description: Candidates can follow the below steps while applying for admission.

basic_info.name: Academy of Technology, Hooghly Placement
description: Academy of Technology, Hooghly has an active placement cell. They invite many renowned companies for on-campus recruitment opportunities. The total percentage of placement offers received in the year 2020 was 99.60%. The highest salary package that was offered to students was 8.00 LPA. While, the average salary package was 3.65 LPA. The top recruiters were Amazon, Asahi Glass, Accenture, IBM, Bansal Mechanical Works, Atmecs, Capgemini, Ceasefire etc.
Read More: Academy of Technology Placement

Section.name: About AOT
Section.description:
Academy of Technology (AOT), Hooghly, West Bengal, was established in the year 2003. It is a private institute which is affiliated with Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology. At present, Academy of Technology offers B.Tech at UG level and MCA & MBA at PG level. All courses are approved by AICTE. Admission to the courses is done on the basis of entrance examinations such as JEE Mains/ WBJEE/ JECA/ JELET/ MAT/ JEMAT
Read More: Academy of Technology, Hooghly Courses & Fees
Academy of Technology, Hooghly offers admission to students on the basis of scores obtained in entrance exams.
Admission to B.tech is based on JEE Mains/ WBJEE while, for lateral entry admission to B.tech course, one must have a JELET score. MBA and MCA Admission is done through MAT/ JEMAT and JECA respectively.
Candidates must apply for counselling for the desired course. The college does not conduct its own admissions.
Candidates can follow the below steps while applying for admission.

Academy of Technology, Hooghly has an active placement cell. They invite many renowned companies for on-campus recruitment opportunities. The total percentage of placement offers received in the year 2020 was 99.60%. The highest salary package that was offered to students was 8.00 LPA. While, the average salary package was 3.65 LPA. The top recruiters were Amazon, Asahi Glass, Accenture, IBM, Bansal Mechanical Works, Atmecs, Capgemini, Ceasefire etc.

Ques. What is the MBA fee structure at Academy of Technology, Hooghly?
Ans. MBA fee structure is as follows:
Ques. Who are the top recruiters at Academy of Technology, Hooghly?
Ans. The top recruiters at Academy of Technology in 2020 were Amazon, IBM, Accenture, Cognizant, Bansal Mechanical Works, Atmecs, Capgemini, Ceasefire and several more.
Ques. Does the Academy of Technology, Hooghly offer Lateral Entry into B.Tech?
Ans. Yes. Academy of Technology offers lateral entry into B.Tech across six branches. Candidates seeking to apply must score a valid rank in the JELET entrance examination and thereafter apply for counselling conducted by the same.
Ques. What is the B.Tech intake of Academy of Technology, Hooghly?
Ans. The B.Tech course wise intake is given below:
Ques. Does the Academy of Technology, Hooghly provide accommodation facilities?
Ans. Yes, the Academy of Technology does provide hostel facilities. It has separate hostels for boys and girls located within the campus. The Boys’ Hostel has the capacity to accommodate 250 students and the Girl’s Hostel has the capacity to accommodate 130 students.
